description: Returns information about one or more merge conflicts in the attempted merge of two commit specifiers using the squash or three-way merge strategy.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository that contains the merge conflicts you want to review.

parameters.name: destinationCommitSpecifier
parameters.description: The branch, tag, HEAD, or other fully qualified reference used to identify a commit (for example, a branch name or a full commit ID).

parameters.name: sourceCommitSpecifier
parameters.description: The branch, tag, HEAD, or other fully qualified reference used to identify a commit (for example, a branch name or a full commit ID).

parameters.name: mergeOption
parameters.description: The merge option or strategy you want to use to merge the code.

parameters.name: filePaths
parameters.description: The path of the target files used to describe the conflicts. If not specified, the default is all conflict files. (string) ---

nested_items.name: conflicts
nested_items.description: A list of conflicts for each file, including the conflict metadata and the hunks of the differences between the files.

nested_items.name: conflictMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata about a conflict in a merge operation.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The path of the file that contains conflicts.

nested_items.name: fileSizes
nested_items.description: The file sizes of the file in the source, destination, and base of the merge.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The size of a file in the source of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The size of a file in the destination of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: base
nested_items.description: The size of a file in the base of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: fileModes
nested_items.description: The file modes of the file in the source, destination, and base of the merge.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The file mode of a file in the source of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The file mode of a file in the destination of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: base
nested_items.description: The file mode of a file in the base of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: objectTypes
nested_items.description: Information about any object type conflicts in a merge operation.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The type of the object in the source branch.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The type of the object in the destination branch.

nested_items.name: base
nested_items.description: The type of the object in the base commit of the merge.

nested_items.name: numberOfConflicts
nested_items.description: The number of conflicts, including both hunk conflicts and metadata conflicts.

nested_items.name: isBinaryFile
nested_items.description: A boolean value (true or false) indicating whether the file is binary or textual in the source, destination, and base of the merge.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The binary or non-binary status of file in the source of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The binary or non-binary status of a file in the destination of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: base
nested_items.description: The binary or non-binary status of a file in the base of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: contentConflict
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether there are conflicts in the content of a file.

nested_items.name: fileModeConflict
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether there are conflicts in the file mode of a file.

nested_items.name: objectTypeConflict
nested_items.description: A boolean value (true or false) indicating whether there are conflicts between the branches in the object type of a file, folder, or submodule.

nested_items.name: mergeOperations
nested_items.description: Whether an add, modify, or delete operation caused the conflict between the source and destination of the merge.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The operation (add, modify, or delete) on a file in the source of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The operation on a file in the destination of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: mergeHunks
nested_items.description: A list of hunks that contain the differences between files or lines causing the conflict.

nested_items.name: isConflict
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether a combination of hunks contains a conflict. Conflicts occur when the same file or the same lines in a file were modified in both the source and destination of a merge or pull request. Valid values include true, false, and null. True when the hunk represents a conflict and one or more files contains a line conflict. File mode conflicts in a merge do not set this to true.

nested_items.name: startLine
nested_items.description: The start position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: endLine
nested_items.description: The end position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: hunkContent
nested_items.description: The base-64 encoded content of the hunk merged region that might contain a conflict.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: Information about the merge hunk in the destination of a merge or pull request.

nested_items.name: startLine
nested_items.description: The start position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: endLine
nested_items.description: The end position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: hunkContent
nested_items.description: The base-64 encoded content of the hunk merged region that might contain a conflict.

nested_items.name: startLine
nested_items.description: The start position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: endLine
nested_items.description: The end position of the hunk in the merge result.

nested_items.name: hunkContent
nested_items.description: The base-64 encoded content of the hunk merged region that might contain a conflict.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that can be used in a request to return the next batch of the results.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of any errors returned while describing the merge conflicts for each file.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The path to the file.

nested_items.name: exceptionName
nested_items.description: The name of the exception.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message provided by the exception.

nested_items.name: destinationCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the destination commit specifier that was used in the merge evaluation.

nested_items.name: sourceCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the source commit specifier that was used in the merge evaluation.

nested_items.name: baseCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the merge base.
